privacyPolicy.privacyRule1SubText: We may collect personal information such as names, contact details, and booking history to provide efficient grooming services. This information is securely stored and used solely for the purpose of enhancing your grooming experience.
privacyPolicy.privacyRule2SubText: Your data is utilized for appointment scheduling, personalized service delivery, and communication. We prioritize the confidentiality and security of your information, and we do not share it with third parties without your explicit consent.
privacyPolicy.privacyRule3SubText: We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. Your privacy is of utmost importance to us.
privacyPolicy.privacyRule4SubText: Our website uses cookies to enhance your browsing experience. By continuing to use our site, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our privacy policy.
privacyPolicy.termsRule1SubText: By using our booking system and mobile applications, you agree to provide accurate information for appointments. Any misuse or unauthorized access to the system is strictly prohibited.
privacyPolicy.termsRule2SubText: Clients may cancel or reschedule appointments within a reasonable time frame. Late cancellations or no-shows may be subject to a fee.
privacyPolicy.termsRule3SubText: While we strive for excellence in every grooming service, we cannot guarantee specific outcomes. Results may vary based on individual preferences and hair types.
privacyPolicy.termsRule4SubText: All content on our website, including logos, images, and text, is the intellectual property of BeFresh. Unauthorized use or reproduction is strictly prohibited.
privacyPolicy.termsRule5SubText: We reserve the right to update our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy at any time. Continued use of our services implies acceptance of these changes.
